alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Greer; Kiowa; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 1:26AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Washita, southeastern Roger Mills, western Custer, northwestern Kiowa, north central Greer and eastern Beckham Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 126 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Strong City to 4 miles southwest of Elk City to 4 miles southeast of Delhi. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elk City, Sayre, Burns Flat, Sentinel, Hammon, Dill City, Canute, Butler, Carter, Foss, Retrop, Delhi, Foss Reservoir, Stafford, and Berlin. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 20 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Greer; Kiowa; Roger Mills; Washita
